item.description:
The poll results say let's party! It is a bonus cooking club event for December!
A lot of our regulars could not come on a Sunday in December, so I've chosen a Saturday.

The theme is wrapped food so each thing we eat is a little gift of food. Just this one time - let's make it more potluck and do the majority of the cooking before arrival.

If you want or need to cook on site that is, of course, alright.

We are going to start earlier at 6:30PM and go until it is over. My hope is that even if you have a later party that day you'll come to cooking club first!

!!If you want to help me decorate the tree come as early as 4:30PM!! Please!

Come celebrate the holiday and our two years of cooking club friendships!
item.how_to_find_us: I will send the address a few days before the event
item.name: Holiday Wrap Party
